= Overview =
An Open Source DHCPv6 Server implemented in Java.
Jagornet DHCPv6 Server Community Edition supports the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6 (DHCPv6) as defined by [http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3315.txt RFC 3315].

=== Features ===
  * Highly-scalable, multithreaded architecture
  * Dynamic DNS
  * Prefix Delegation
  * Flexible, XML configuration file format
  * Java Management Extensions (JMX) support
